title: Aliases for Result
description: In this lab, we learn how to create aliases for a specific Result type in Rust, allowing us to reuse it multiple times and conveniently define all associated Results within a module.

meta.title: Mastering Rust Aliases for Result
meta.description: Learn how to create aliases for a specific Result type in Rust, enabling reuse and convenient error handling.
meta.keywords: rust playground, error handling, rust online ide, rust tutor, rust online compiler, rust commands, aliases, rust online playground, rust practice, rust online

i18n.title: Result 的别名
